AI Description: metaseq is a Python library for analyzing RNA-Seq data and differential expression analysis. It provides tools for visualizing gene expression results, exploring gene ontology, clustering samples, and identifying enriched pathways.
Core Features: RNA-Seq Data Analysis, Differential Gene Expression Analysis, Visualization Of Gene Expression Results, Functional Enrichment Analysis, Sample Clustering, Pathway Analysis
General Tags: RNA-Seq, Data Analysis, Bioinformatics, Python Library
